name: Scaled Down 64
description:
Created for #LOWREZJAM 2016

Descend to the bottom of Lake Diefenbaker as an abandoned pet Koi fish, a Walleye, a Rainbow Trout, and a Sturgeon.

Four Levels of FISHY FUN in 64 x 64 bit fashion!

Controls:

Keyboard

enter: start
left key : rotate left
right key : rotate right
up key : swim forward
down key : swim backward

Controller

left on control stick : rotate left
right on control stick : rotate right
A button : swim forward
B button : swim backward

ALT + ENTER for fullscreen

Credits:

Programming/Coding, Design, Production
Sterling Thomas (taco.)

Sprites and Graphics and Animations
Nicole Barrington (Koi, Walleye, Sturgeon and animations for all, siq ass Title graphic)
Sterling Thomas (Everything else)

Sound and Music
Sterling Thomas (Sound effects, Menu, Tutorial, Koi, Walleye, and Credit music)
Nicole Barrington (Rainbow Trout and Sturgeon music)

Nicole provided the idea

v 1.1 fixed rotation bug movement for using keyboard as controls
